data.rationale:
I have taken Daniel J. Urist's WWW::Babelfish and designed a plugin
    architecture for it.

    So far, there are two back-ends:- Babelfish, which contacts
    altavista to provide translation, and SysTran, which contacts a
    SysTran server (this is the software used by Babelfish).
